dmca.title: DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Twitter
dmca.body:
Sandi Sanctuary, Jul-08 03:39 pm (PDT):

Tell us about yourself: I am the copyright owner.
Your full name: [redacted]
Job title: performer

Email address: [redacted]
Street address: [redacted]
City: ST-LAURENT
State/Province: QUEBEC
Postal code: H4L5B1
Country: CANADA
Phone number(optional): [REDACTED]
Fax number(optional): n/a

Description of original work: To whomsoever concerned,

As per the 17 USC 512(c)(3)(A) of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act (â€œDMCAâ€), This communication serves as a DMCA takedown notice.
This is to formally notify that I am the copyright owner of the image at the location originally created by me here:

http://sandi_squirts.cammodels.com/gallerypopup.php?arch=20110513&smid=5844870

I am requesting the removal of the infringements observed at this twitter account: http://twitter.com/#!/FetishBallBabe

I hereby request you to immediately issue a content removal message or take action to remove the allegedly infringed content at the above specified location.

I have good faith that the use of the copyrighted material notified here as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.  Kindly send me a response to this request and the action take at the earliest.
[REDACTED] aka. Sandi_Squirts

Reported Twitter account: FetishBallBabe
Description of Infringement: using my copyrighted image on their Twitter avatar l without permission.
Type of infringing material: n/a
Type of infringing material: Avatar (profile picture)
Type of infringing material: n/a
512(f) Acknowledgment: I understand that under 17 U.S.C. Â§ 512(f), I may be liable for any damages, including costs and attorneys' fees, if I knowingly materially misrepresent that reported material or activity is infringing.

Good Faith Belief: I have good faith belief that use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

Authority to Act: The information in this notification is accurate, and I state under penalty of perjury that I am authorized to act on behalf of the copyright owner.

Signature: [redacted]
